## Binding.toAlias() method

Bind the key to an alias of another binding

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toAlias(keyWithPath: BindingAddress<T>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyWithPath | <code>BindingAddress&lt;T&gt;</code> | Target binding key with optional path, such as <code>servers.RestServer.options#apiExplorer</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
